name: checkout-shipping-address
description: Shipping address allows to add or select the shipping address for the order

showAddressType.description: If true allows user to view/edit address type field. For example: Home, Business etc.

imageSettings.description: Image settings for checkout shipping address

className.description: Provide a custom css class name defined in the theme pack to target the CSS for this module

clientRender.description: Enabling this property will cause the module to load its Javascript chunk and render on the client based on the user view port. This property is recommended for modules which are generally hidden below the users view port (lower on the page) to increase page load performance.

multipleAddressShippingEnabled.friendlyName: Enable multiple shipping addresses for an order
multipleAddressShippingEnabled.description: Enabling this property will allow the customers to choose unique shipping address per order line.

autoSuggestOptions.description: Provide additional data to customized auto suggest

addressPrimaryButtonAriaLabel.value: Set {addressName} address as your primary address

addressStateDefaultSelectionText.comment: Default selection text for state drop down

addressNameRequiredErrorMessage.comment: Error message to display when name is not provided

addressPhoneRequiredErrorMessage.comment: Error message to display when phone is not provided

addressPhoneFormatErrorMessage.comment: Error message to display when phone format is wrong
addressPhoneFormatErrorMessage.value: Only numeric characters, spaces, +, - and parentheses are valid entries

addressPhoneMaxLengthErrorMessage.comment: Error message to display when phone MaxLength is incorrect
addressPhoneMaxLengthErrorMessage.value: Phone exceeds maximum limit of 30 characters

addressAddressTypeValueLabel.comment: Label for the Address Type field

addressZipCodeRequiredErrorMessage.comment: Error message to display when zip code is not provided

addressCityRequiredErrorMessage.comment: Error message to display when city is not provided

addressCountyRequiredErrorMessage.comment: Error message to display when county is not provided

addressStateRequiredErrorMessage.comment: Error message to display when zip code is not provided

addressThreeLetterISORegionNameRequiredE.comment: Error message to display when country is not provided

addressStreetRequiredErrorMessage.comment: Error message to display when street is not provided

addressDistrictRequiredErrorMessage.comment: Error message to display when district is not provided

addressStreetNumberLabel.comment: Label for the street number field

addressStreetNumberRequiredErrorMessage.comment: Error message to display when street number is not provided

addressBuildingComplimentLabel.comment: Label for the building compliment field

addressBuildingComplimentRequiredErrorMe.comment: Error message to display when building compliment is not provided

addressPostboxLabel.comment: Label for the post box field

addressPostboxRequiredErrorMessage.comment: Error message to display when post box is not provided

addressHouseRURequiredErrorMessage.comment: Error message to display when house is not provided

addressFlatRURequiredErrorMessage.comment: Error message to display when flat is not provided

addressCountryOKSMCodeRURequiredErrorMes.comment: Error message to display when countryoksmcode is not provided

addressErrorMessageTitle.comment: Localized text for error message title

addressGenericErrorMessage.comment: Generic error message for Address module
addressGenericErrorMessage.value: Something went wrong. Please try again later

addressEmptyListAddressMessage.comment: Generic message to show in list address component when no addresses are present
addressEmptyListAddressMessage.value: No addresses are present. Please add one.

itemsText.comment: Display number of items for the shipping group

singleItemText.comment: Display one item for the shipping group

productQuantityInfo.comment: Text to read the quantity of given product

errorMessageTitle.comment: Localized text for error message title

addressSelectAllRowsText.comment: ARIA Text to show when user can select all rows

addressProductNumberText.comment: Name of the product number column of the multiple address shipping table

addressProductText.comment: Name of the product column of the multiple address shipping table

addressProductUnitPriceText.comment: Name of the product unit price column of the multiple address shipping table

addressProductQuantityText.comment: Name of the quantity column of the multiple address shipping table

addressProductAddressText.comment: Name of the address column of the multiple address shipping table

addressShipSingleAriaLabel.comment: Ship to single address aria label

chooseAddressForSelectedItemsAriaLabel.comment: Initial aria label for address dropdown

unavailableProductErrorMessage.comment: Message to show error when order template line is not available

outOfStockProductErrorMessage.comment: Message to show error when order template line is out of stock

headingAfterMultiSelectAddressSelect.comment: Heading to show after multi select address select
headingAfterMultiSelectAddressSelect.value: You are shipping items to multiple addresses. See details below.
